entries.title: First met
entries.content:
The day we met my heart took flight 
 Your Haryanvi tone just felt so right.
 I judged too soon led by the crowd 
 But I'm glad I was wrongâ€”so deeply proud.

entries.title: Valentine's little moments
entries.content: We didn't need anything fancy. Your smile did all the magic.

entries.title: Missed you today
entries.content: Even the silence felt like it was saying your name.

entries.title: Valentine's little moments
entries.content: We didn't need anything fancy. Your smile did all the magic.
